item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to the lowendlibre blog! Here we post about our efforts porting mobile Linux distros to a variety of low-end (generally) MediaTek based devices. We mostly focus on postmarketOS for the main porting effort, but we plan to support Mobian and maybe a few other distros. ;) If this interests you, then welcome! Strap in and get ready for a bumpy ride because… HERE BE DRAGONS
item.content:
Welcome to the lowendlibre blog! Here we post about our efforts porting mobile Linux distros to a variety of low-end (generally) MediaTek based devices. We mostly focus on postmarketOS for the main porting effort, but we plan to support Mobian and maybe a few other distros. ;) If this interests you, then welcome! Strap in and get ready for a bumpy ride because…

HERE BE DRAGONS

About

  _    _      _ _        __          __        _     _ 
 | |  | |    | | |       \ \        / /       | |   | |
 | |__| | ___| | | ___    \ \  /\  / /__  _ __| | __| |
 |  __  |/ _ \ | |/ _ \    \ \/  \/ / _ \| '__| |/ _` |
 | |  | |  __/ | | (_) |    \  /\  / (_) | |  | | (_| |
 |_|  |_|\___|_|_|\___/      \/  \/ \___/|_|  |_|\__,_|

Hi! Thanks for checking out the lowendlibre project.

Who are we?

This project is headed by justsoup and hexaheximal. Our main goal is to bring the mobile Linux ecosystem to low-end and generally MediaTek based devices. lowendlibre was founded on July 10, 2023 when our two separate projects merged with the same goal in mind. Linux.
